sentences.en: But the authorities are reluctant to take this step, given the fragility of the economy.
sentences.cn: 但当局并不愿意采取此等措施, (害怕)挫伤经济.

sentences.en: By mid-1988 there were clear indications of the extreme fragility of the Right-wing coalition.
sentences.cn: 到1988年年中，有明显迹象表明右翼联盟极度脆弱。

sentences.en: China traditionally feared any fragility and volatility in North Korea.
sentences.cn: 中国历来担心朝鲜出现任何垮台迹象和动荡.

sentences.en: Fears about the fragility of the global recovery are exaggerated .
sentences.cn: 全球经济复苏脆弱性的恐惧被夸大了。

sentences.en: Given the extreme fragility of the private sector, that could cause another economic downturn.
sentences.cn: 鉴于私营部门的极度脆弱, 这可能再度造成经济低迷.

sentences.en: He saw in her tender fragility.
If he was ill, why didn't anyone do something about his fragility?
sentences.cn: 假如他生病了，为什么没有任何人为他的脆弱做些什么？

sentences.en: It has exposed the fragility of the foundations of private finance: opaqueness , hazard and sometimes fraud.
sentences.cn: 它暴露出了私人金融根基的脆弱性 —— 不透明 、 冒险、甚至有时还有欺诈行为.

sentences.en: Older drivers are more likely to be seriously injured because of the fragility of their bones.
sentences.cn: 老司机由于骨骼脆化更有可能受重伤。

sentences.en: Otherwise, we would soon return to the world of fragility and bail - outs .
sentences.cn: 否则, 我们很快就会回到不堪一击和必须 纾 困的境地.

sentences.en: Render the body is also the fragility of life and life limits of The cramped.
sentences.cn: 同样是渲染肉体生命的脆弱和生命限度的局促.

sentences.en: Solidity in the north up for fragility in the south.
sentences.cn: 欧元区域北部经济的稳健弥补了其南部区域经济的衰弱.

sentences.en: Tears are a sign of fragility.
The island - state's unalterable fragility is beyond dispute.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的脆弱,是谁也无法否认及改变的事实.

sentences.en: The problem could be called the " fragility of perfection "
sentences.cn: 这一问题可以被称作 “ 脆弱的完美(fragilityofperfection) ”
